titles.title: Nursing School Clinics Act of 2011
A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of services provided by nursing school clinics under State Medicaid programs.
Nursing School Clinics Act of 2011

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Nursing School Clinics Act of 2011 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of nursing school clinic services.
